name: 20x20x20
description:
20x20x20 is a tiny maze game, where you must activate the four mysterious orbs to unlock the exit and escape the labyrinth. There are 20 rooms navigate, and though a way through might not seem obvious at first, never fear! For you possess the uncanny ability to rearrange the rooms by scrolling the rows and columns. Keep an eye out for that meddling labyrinth goblin though...

Controls are as follows:

  • left and right arrows to move
  • space to jump
  • x to scroll columns
  • z to scroll rows
  • r to restart
  • ESC to exit
  • F11 to toggle fullscreen or windowed

The arrows will indicate which rows/columns will move when scrolling.

This is my first game, so all feedback is welcome. Made as part of the GameMaker 20 Jam.
